product_name: Sierra Designs Liberty Rain Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Providing waterproof, breathable protection in a fitted silhouette, the Sierra Designs Liberty Rain Jacket feels and looks fabulous on the trail or in the city. Waterproof, breathable nylon fabric shields you from rain and wind without letting you overheat. Removable, adjustable hood completes coverage; fully taped seams ensure water never leaks through. Zippered hand pockets and zippered interior chest pocket offer plenty of storage. Sierra Designs Liberty Rain Jacket featues a slim cut for a feminine shape. Closeout.
short_description: Providing waterproof, breathable protection in a fitted silhouette, the Sierra Designs Liberty Rain Jacket feels and looks fabulous on the trail or in the city.
